headline: NETGEAR Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Q1 Guidance Provided
summary: NTGR tops Q4 EPS and revenue estimates as Enterprise strength lifts margins, adds subscribers and management issues Q1 revenue guidance.

raw.headline: NETGEAR Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Q1 Guidance Provided

headline: How The Narrative Around Corning (GLW) Is Shifting After New Deals And Analyst Revisions
summary: Analysts have recently marked up their fair value estimate on Corning stock from US$93.31 to US$114.46, a change of about US$21 that reflects fresh thinking on how its long term story is playing out. Behind that move, models are being fine tuned with a slightly lower discount rate and only marginal tweaks to revenue growth assumptions, as the market digests new information and shifting sentiment around the company. If you want to stay ahead of these kinds of updates, keep reading to see how...

headline: Corning (GLW) Among Hidden Winners To Watch In AI Investing Space
summary: SUMMARY: The rapid expansion of artificial intelligence is driving an enormous build-out of data centers, with total investment expected to reach unprecedented levels. While major AI companies dominate headlines, much of the real opportunity may lie in less visible businesses that provide the infrastructure behind the scenes. These “glue” companies supply the materials, networking, and ... Corning (GLW) Among Hidden Winners To Watch In AI Investing Space
